name: Hope grows - WSS
description:
"Hope grows" -  by Artist Vaso (Greece)

This design is very artistic and meaningful.  It is printed off-set left and wraps over the side seam for a very unique and one-of-a kind look.

Shirt - Super-soft Women's fashion fit "Perfect T."
Color - light blue
Sizes - S / M / L / XL / XXL

FYI:
This shirt is a Pima Apparel Luxury cap sleeve.  You'll love the look and fit.  Please keep in mind that these shirts are fashion fitted.  They do run a bit smaller and fit a bit more snug.  If you desire a more open fit or are busty, consider ordering 1 size larger than you normally wear.  See "shirt sizing" for garment measurements.
(model is 5'8" 135 lbs. - wearing a size Large)

name: Love Heart - WSS
description:
"Love Heart" -  by Artist Vaso (Greece)

This design takes the tradional "heart" to a whole new level with hand-painted elements and layered graphics on a super soft brown heather fashion shirt.

Shirt - Super-soft Women's fashion fit crew neck "T."
Color - brown heather
Sizes - S / M / L / XL / XXL

FYI:
This shirt is super soft.  You'll love the look and fit.  Please do keep in mind that these shirts are fashion fitted.  They do run a bit smaller and fit a bit more snug.  If you desire a more open fit or are busty, consider ordering 1 size larger than you normally wear.  See "shirt sizing" for garment measurements.
(model is 5'6" 125 lbs. - wearing a size Medium)

name: Compassion - WSS
description:
"Compassion" -  by Artist Vaso (Greece)

In this design, the Goddess of Compassion and Mercy is watching over us all.  Outstanding artistry and symbolism are depicted in this unique design.   

Shirt:  100% cotton, super-soft Women's fashion fit "Sporty V."
Color:   White
Sizes:  S / M / L / XL / XXL

FYI:
This shirt is a Next Level (Junior cut) Sporty V.  You'll love the look and fit.  Please keep in mind that these shirts are fashion fitted.  They do run a bit smaller and fit a bit more snug.  If you desire a more open fit or are busty, consider ordering 1 size larger than you normally wear.  See "shirt sizing" for garment measurements.
(model is 5'8" 135 lbs. - wearing a size Large)

name: Tattoo Love - WSS
description:
"Tattoo Love" -  by Artist Richard (United States)

This design is "hand-drawn" and full of life.  A combination of elements and oversized printing make this shirt a stand-out when you wear it. 

Shirt - 100% cotton, super-soft Women's fashion fit "Deep V."

If you desire a more open fit or are busty, consider ordering 1 size larger than you normally wear.  See "shirt sizing" for garment measurements.

name: Seek Truth - WSS
description:
"Seek Truth" -  by Artist Vaso (Greece)

This just may be one of the most unique and thought-provoking depictions of Truth we have ever seen.  Compelling, beautiful, and strong are only a few words to describe this spectacular piece of wearable art.  You'll love getting noticed with this shirt.

Shirt – 100% cotton,  super-soft Women's fashion fit "Sporty V."
Color - white
Sizes - S / M / L / XL / XXL

FYI:
This shirt is a Next Level (Junior cut) Sporty V.  You'll love the look and fit.  Please keep in mind that these shirts are fashion fitted.  They do run a bit smaller and fit a bit more snug.  If you desire a more open fit or are busty, consider ordering 1 size larger than you normally wear.  See "shirt sizing" for garment measurements.
(model is 5'8" 135 lbs. - wearing a size Large)

name: Faces of Tolerance - WO
description:
"Faces of Tolerance" -  by Artist Vaso (Greece)

Everyone can identify with the faces of Tolerance that are found in this meaningful, impactful design.    If you look at the left and right edges of the design, you'll see shilouettes of faces.  While the design shows the many different colors of us all, it also shows how those colors all come together to be just one.  Outstanding artistry captures the essence of this message. 

Shirt - Super-soft Women's fashion fit "Perfect T."
Color - burnt orange
Sizes - S / M / L / XL / XXL

FYI:
This shirt is a Pima Apparel Luxury cap sleeve.  You'll love the look and fit.  Please keep in mind that these shirts are fashion fitted.  They do run a bit smaller and fit a bit more snug.  If you desire a more open fit or are busty, consider ordering 1 size larger than you normally wear.  See "shirt sizing" for garment measurements.
(model is 5'6" 125 lbs. - wearing a size Medium)

name: Respect - Just Released!
description:
"Respect" - by Artist Richard (USA)

Our newest design, Respect, is a masterpiece of creativity by one of our most talented Artists.  This design (hand-drawn) features a dragon with the word "Respect" draped around his twisted torso.  The addition of other elements and beautiful coloring, all on a vibrant red super-soft T, make this shirt a stand-out.

name: Note card set (8 card set - 4 designs)
description:
Color Our World artwork is perfect for note cards.  The set includes 8 cards & envelopes on high quality white vellum cardstock.  Get them for yourself or as a gift!   

Designs include:  Compassion / Tolerance / Hope / Truth.
